description: Prof. Kaufmann (Birbeck College) investigates whether Whites in homogeneous English neighbourhoods oppose immigration more.
itunes:subtitle: Prof. Kaufmann (Birbeck College) investigates whether Whites in homogeneous English neighbourhoods oppose immigration more.

title: Is there 'White Flight?' in England? Why Whites in Homogeneous English Wards Are More Opposed to Immigration
